dmca.title: Legal Issue
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Michael Gray [mailto:graywolf@wolf-howl.com] 
Posted At: Monday, July 24, 2006 8:31 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Legal Issue
Subject: Legal Issue


Dear Sirs,
Please be aware that the domain empireblogs.com which is registered
through your servers is using copyrighted material from my website
without prior permission

http://seo.empireblogs.com/2006/07/21/adwords-quality-score-why-it-won%e
2%80%99t-roll-back/

As per my liscenicing agreement which is linked to from that page I am
initiating legal proceedings in the amount of $1500 per offending page

http://www.wolf-howl.com/information/licensing-information/

I request that you turn over all official contact information for this
domain. Thanks you for your cooperation.

Michael Gray
